Yessenia and her husband Carlos have been advocating for immigrant rights in Denver for years and bravely sharing their family’s story. items.title: Yessenia and her husband Carlos have been advocating for...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Yessenia and her husband Carlos have been advocating for immigrant rights in Denver for years and bravely sharing their family’s story. This weekend they’re selling pupusas, which are incredibly popular in El Salvador, Carlos’ home country, and in Salvadoran & Honduran communities across the U.S. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Share please

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling pupusas for pickup on the 23rd in Denver & Boulder! She’s a mom to two children and is fighting to keep her family together, along with all ...families impacted by the violent U.S. immigration system. One way you can support is by ordering her food & sharing her story. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
